void(* N_LinkTarget_Callback_t::ScanIndication)(N_InterPan_ScanRequest_t *pScanRequest)

Notify the application that the device has been scanned.

void(* N_LinkTarget_Callback_t::IdentifyStartIndication)(uint16_t timeoutInSec)

Requests the application to identify itself with the given timeout.

Parameters:
timeoutInSecThe requested timeout in seconds

Definition at line 100 of file N_LinkTarget.h.

Requests the application to stop identifying itself.

Definition at line 104 of file N_LinkTarget.h.

void(* N_LinkTarget_Callback_t::ResetIndication)(void)

Requests the application to reset itself to factory defaults.

Definition at line 108 of file N_LinkTarget.h.

void(* N_LinkTarget_Callback_t::JoinNetworkIndication)(uint16_t groupIdFirst, uint16_t groupIdLast)

Indication that the device has been linked to a new network by the initiator.

Parameters:
groupIdFirstThe first group identifier assigned to the device during linking. Zero if no groups where assigned
groupIdLastThe last group identifier assigned to the device during linking. Zero if no groups where assigned
Note:
The target type has been set to None, see N_LinkTarget_SetTargetType.

Definition at line 117 of file N_LinkTarget.h.

void(* N_LinkTarget_Callback_t::UpdateNetworkIndication)(void)

Indication that the network settings of the device have been updated by the initiator.

Note:
The target type has been set to None, see N_LinkTarget_SetTargetType.

Guard. Must be -1.
